website_summaries.verdict: This super handy little table is great for use by one person.
pros: This sturdy table can hold a lot of weight for its size
Can adjust to four different heights
Stores easily under or behind a piece of furniture
Great for a multitude of uses
cons: The tabletop has a slight texture, which may make it too bumpy for cleanly writing on a piece of paper

customer_reviews.title: Great sewing table
customer_reviews.text: As shown in the photos this table accommodates a sewing machine and the Sew Steady extension. This table is lighter and easier to transport than the more expensive portable sewing tables. The legs are not in the center of the table depth so you can put the roomier side at your lap/legs and there is plenty of room for a foot pedal. Love it for sewing at classes and workshops.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M

customer_reviews.title: Using this as a small patio table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match with 4 ikea folding chairs for patio to make them look like a patio set. Height is adjustable and legs are sturdy. Bigger than I expected, works perfectly for my patio. In picture, I set the table to the highest. It can go as low as the seat.
customer_reviews.author: mjm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a laptop desk when I want to work in the living room. It's very compact, so I can fold it up and put it away in the laundry room when I'm done. It's incredibly easy to set up, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bingo

customer_reviews.title: This one is PERFECT! It adjusts to just the right height
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a more of a couch person, as opposed to a desk person. So I needed a table that I could work on in my office, from my couch. This one is PERFECT! It adjusts to just the right height, and I can fold it up and store it under the couch when I’m done working. It’s extremely study and doesn’t wobble. And the price is excellent. I’d buy it again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a STANDING DESK!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for something AFFORDABLE that I could use as a standing desk. I already had a desk, so I just needed something that I could use when I felt like standing. This is PERFECT. At its lowest height setting, it was a little higher than I needed, so I took it apart and moved the "stationary" leg - that gave me the ability to adjust the table to a lower height. It's lightweight but so far is very sturdy - I have TWO monitors on it, a wireless keyboard and wireless mouse. For anyone looking for a standing desk that won't put you out close to $500, give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Adkins

customer_reviews.title: A pile of poop in the box!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the product, however the packaging was double boxed with a pile of literally poop in it. It was on the table and fell out of the box onto my carpet. How in the world does that happen? Was this product returned and never opened to inspect? Did the employee do this to the company? I wish I had thought to take a picture but the first thought I had was to get rid of the poop and disinfect my home.
customer_reviews.author: Clara L Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. It's perfect for my needs. I enjoy doing crafts and other items in the evenings but like to be with my family in the living room. It was hard into rocker recliner. It sits low and this table lets you adjust it at varying heights. The lowest level is perfect for me. I can do my drafts, work on my laptop, have a meal or basically anything. It's also easy to clean and stores super easy under my couch. Out of sight out of mind. I highly suggest this table for many purposes. Would be great for children too. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Dog showers made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with this table. Purchased to bathe my pooches in the shower. The height is adjustable and tallest height is great as I do not need to bend too much. Bathing a squirming dog is hard enough and this sturdy table makes it so much easier. Can hold up to 40lbs.
customer_reviews.author: 3n@

customer_reviews.title: I hate giving anything 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I hate giving anything 5 stars. This table turned out to be not exactly what I was looking for. I wanted something that collapsed more compactly, but this does collapse very flat. However, the quality and the sturdiness? This thing will out live your pet tortoise. What I bought it for was to have a sturdy table at the outdoor police shooting range to hold my guns and ammunition off the ground and to reload magazines, which need a very stable surface . It has exceeded my expectations. This table is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Great Table. Used this table for a desk with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Table. Used this table for a desk with a laptop as well as for general meal prep while camping, eating, reading, etc. The Good: Table is relatively light without being excessively light. The top is quite sturdy. I spilled a staining food on it. After scrubbing, the stain came out and the table looked fine. The table is height adjustable 21", 24", 26", and 28" The Possible Issues: Latching method to both close the table and change the height is potential failure point, it feels like the most flimsy portion of the table. However, I have not have any issues with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great little big table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table becase of the length. Because I started to work from home due to the "Stay home" order, I needed a table that would accommodate my keyboard, mouse, and Spaceball. The adjustability is nice, sitting on the sofa (I use my TV as my monitor) I set the legs to the lowest setting. Not the perfect ergo, but good enough. The only possible downside are the feet are slick and don't really grip the floor which is kinda nice, I can can just push the table away when I need to get up. After quarantine the wife will use the table for her art.
customer_reviews.author: G. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Much better and usefull than I expected
customer_reviews.text: My wife hounded me for quite some time to buy this table. I did not feel the cost was worth the value. Ok, so I had to eat some crow - this table is very useful and we have found several different way to use it. The flexibility it gives by adjusting the legs for height cannot be overstressed. It is solid at any height and just the right size for most uses out at our cabin. Go ahead and bite the bullet on this one, it is worth it (and NO, I did not get anything for this review - unfortunately).
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to set up or take down
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this table. It was challenging to set the legs in place. I thought I would need to donate the table to charity so that someone else would have better luck, but after many tries, I was able to get the legs in place. Now that I want to change the height of the table, it seems impossible to reposition the legs. Go with a more conventional folding table and skip the frustration,
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a table like this for awhile now and am completely thrilled with this one. I use it for eating in front of the t.v. as well as personal Bible study. It's larger than I had imagined. It's perfect when I am studying because I can layout several books and resources. Also, I am happily surprised that it pulls close to me as I eat or work with reading material. I found it difficult to pull the legs down when I first got it. I went back and looked at the video on this site and found that I wasn't squeezing the 'trigger' hard enough. I am really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Since Coronavirus required everyone to be in quarantine I needed a last minute and cheap work from home “desk”. This did the job, it’s sturdy and roomy for the personal option. It was so easy to set up that and fast. Will probably buy more so I can eat and watch Netflix on my couch!
customer_reviews.author: Samoya Li

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and very sturdy, great for indoor and outdoor use, perfect pool tray
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tray to attached to our 30" deep above ground pool for drinks, snacks, phones, toys etc. There was no place to set anything around this pool. Nothing I found would attached to this type of pool properly and I didn't want my items on a floating tray. This table adjusts to the exact height of the pool (and other heights). A great find and I will probably order more for other uses around the house...tv trays, portable laptop stand, or as an extra table for snacks or bevs to set around when entertaining. Folds flat and is extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: STF

customer_reviews.title: Great table for smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike TV trays, this table is perfect for easy setup in the living room and is not wiggly on a carpet. I'm still wrestling with the fold-out, but probably because I haven't done it enough. I can't wait to use it as a table for my sewing machine. It can be used as an extra end-table for work or for anything you can think of that would require a small sturdy table. The hight variations are a plus for sure, and I would recommend this for anyone who is moving to a smaller place, or as a must-have in an apartment. It folds up quite nicely and will store almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: sonshines

customer_reviews.title: Nice large tray!
customer_reviews.text: This initially was mistakenly delivered to my neighbor's house! I thought it was lost in transit. Anyway I have been using this as a tray to use in my yard and in my garage for my work laptop during COVID-19 quarantine. I have a few wooden trays that I have had the misfortune of having a laptop slip off of a time or two. I wanted something sturdy and spacious. This fulfills both. I like the material as it is easy to clean and feels very durable and not easy to tip over. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Coco P

customer_reviews.title: Cheap defective product. Do not buy !
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product from Lifetime is terrible, it is much cheaper than one I had purchased a few years ago. The table is wably and uneven, it seems that one leg is shorter. The tubes ( legs ) are much smaller in diameter. I am very disapointed and will never buy a Lifetime product again if that is the direction that they are going. Lifetime had great products that I used and still use, but this table is not the minimal quality i was expecting. Too bad !
customer_reviews.author: Lise T.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: My son puts his laptop on here to study for school and loves it. We also use it as a TV tray. There is plenty of room for your feet and your dinner :) I have tried to used as a sewing table but my sewing machine caused it to vibrate a bit more than i wanted but could be used in a pinch. It stays at each height perfectly and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke.
customer_reviews.text: II couldn't get it in an upright position. You're supposed to squeeze two sides together and then pop the ends into holes on either side of the table. Was impossible for me to do. I gave up. I'm sticking with Cosco, it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found the Perfect Little Table
customer_reviews.text: Use the TV in my small bedroom as my PC monitor and needed a small (not too small) folding table that could be tucked away, wide enough for my keyboard and mouse and to eat the occasional meal. Searched for months and finally found this perfect solution. The 26" width is the perfect size and the 3 different adjustment assure the ideal height for a variety of tasks. So easy to unfold when needed and easy to stash in a small area when folded. Even more impressive than the genius design is the sturdy extreme high quality. Can't imagine a more perfect table for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O'Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best table for a small space. I was using my night table to keep my computer on & it was very uncomfortable because there was nowhere to put my legs. Now I use my night table to keep my printer on & I use this table to put my computer on and it is very comfortable. I ordered a chair to go with it and it will arrive on Monday. Cannot wait to see how it works with this new table. This is my far the best $26 ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: brenda prescott

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table 2 years ago and it was much nicer. They cheapened up the features on the new version, even though the photos show the old version. The old version had inch markers on the bottom so you knew how high you were adjusting it to, it was heavier duty, had thicker legs and larger, more sturdy feet. Even the hand cutouts were nicer on the old version. The new version will do the job, I just don't appreciate the downgrade. I would have paid a few dollars more to keep the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My husband just had surgery and is confined to the recliner for a few weeks. We live in a very tiny house so there's not a lot of room for furniture. The table fit perfectly next to his chair and when he recovers I can fold it up and store it easily. It's very sturdy and easy to clean. The height is adjustable and I have it the same height as the arm of his chair to make it easy to reach things he needs. I see many uses for this little table in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Livingston-Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: The top is very thick molded plastic and the legs are metal, so it’s sturdy. I needed a temporary place to store stuff next to my bed for an upcoming surgery and this is perfect. It’s larger than a TV tray and is smaller than a card table by about half. It’s really well made and I’m sure I’ll find many uses for it in the future. It’s one of those things you didn’t know you needed but will come in so handy. Need some extra counter space in the kitchen for a big meal? This would work great. Highly recommended if you need an adjustable table that’s light but tough.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good Table
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this table a few months ago since covid has turned my life into an at home digital world like many others and all of a sudden, I came up with a shortage of available folding tables for quick laptop virtual meetings & other matters. This table works well as expected, no complaints. All adjustment levels are good heights for different purposes. Table is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman RobinsonTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day like a TV tray for handicapped wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table in May, 2015. Use it every day like a TV tray for handicapped wife. Now it is broken and shaky - a crossbrace weld separated making it unstable. Cannot find a direct link to MFG since Amazon connection for this purchase is expired. Can anyone help - suppose to have a 2 year warranty. If no help - will try to find a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy and a large size. Great low profile to store.
customer_reviews.text: Once I acclimated to how the table legs lock open, I was pleasantly surprised. It seems so unbelievably sturdy and a great size for my sewing machine. Folds up flat I can store it behind my chair in living room on it's side or under couch or bed laying flat. The flimsy folding tables that I bought and paid too much for are harder to fold, store, and set up. This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Princesilla

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Right Sized
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these small, 25x30" tables, which I use for on-location sound and video recording. They are sturdy and large enough to hold a 19" rack case, but perfect for a small solid state recorder (e.g., Zoom F8) and laptop. The also fit in the bed of a 4-wheel warehouse cart (Magliner or Westco), serving as a platform on top of equipment cases, in order to carry tripods and microphone stands. The height is adjustable, with three positions, and the overhang is off center to give extra knee room. Setup and takedown is easy, without fiddly toggle links to keep the legs erect.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. Ingold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Back in the sucky 70's and awful 80's, we had to make do with devices called TV trays. They were terrible, rickety things made of cheesy thin pot metal with that collapsed under their own weight, even with the puny trays they featured. Now? We are blessed to have these LIFETIME tray tables that are solid, robust and stable. The trays are easy to clean and the tables fast and easy to set up and collapse and put away. The leg is designed perfectly for extended use and you won't be mashing your feet or legs against the legs of the stand. Bravo, LIFETIME. Bravo.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Maybe 4 stars?
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice little table. My only concern with it is how much pressure is required on the plastic fittings to lock the upper legs into place. It is shaped like a little trigger on the bottom, you squeeze it to make the bracket smaller to fit the movable, upper leg bracket into little holes on the bottom. The trigger assembly and the sliding piece are plastic. If I was going to use this frequently, taking it down and putting it back up then I would expect that to fail. Don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and portable
customer_reviews.text: Great portable table for working from home! I can put my laptop with room to spare for my notepad. Easy to adjust the leg height and enough room for my legs. Pretty easy to store as it folds flat. A little heavy for me but feels sturdy. I love that it has 3 heights so I can sit on a chair or on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: alternate desk
customer_reviews.text: I have a full home office but now that I am working from home every day it was getting a little dark and depressing. I wanted to work on our sun porch with my laptop and a desk/table that could easily be moved or taken down. This was perfect. Plenty of room for my laptop, mouse and a notebook (note I bought the 30 inch). Now I can watch our dogs playing in the fenced part of our property which is great - especially our funny five month old Jack Russell who certainly brings a smile to my face while I work from home.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table, it's the perfect size for me, except for the leg room, there doesn't seem to be a way to be able to stretch your legs out without hitting the table legs, but I can deal with that, it's the perfect height, it folds up, and it's big, that's what I really like about it, I can put alot of items on the table top and still have plenty of room for drinks etc. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a nice large TV table, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gove

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: As I'm having to work from home on a laptop, this table was exactly what I needed to use in a small space. It folds up easy and stores away flat when I'm not using it. The height is adjustable, and the highest height is about desk level. It fits my laptop, keyboard and mouse just fine, and seems to be indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: GogTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I finally found the perfect table!
customer_reviews.text: This is my "Goldilocks" table!! I've ordered 3 different types of side tray tables, none of which were the height I needed for working/eating on my couch. This one is absolutely perfect! It adjusts to 3 different heights. It has a large surface that is very durable and easy to clean. There is no danger of tipping it over, as it is very well balanced. I am so happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Desk
customer_reviews.text: Like many of us, I am having to work from home and needed something I could use during the day and put away at night. I also wanted something portable which would allow me the option to work in different rooms or outside on the patio. This is perfect. I was impressed with the quality of the construction for the price. I like that it has several height choices. There is plenty of room for my laptop and paper materials to the side. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great All Purpose Table!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great table with no assembly, just unfold it out of the box!! I am a senior citizen and do grown up coloring, this table is just the thing for my hobby!!! Also have my MacBook on it when not coloring, also makes a great dining table for eating alone. This is the best bargain I have gotten in a long time!!! Couldn't be more pleased with purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy table to go next to the chair where my elderly sits. Tray tables were always getting dumped. This table is perfect. I can adjudt the height, and its easy to clean! They don't send directions on how to raise it, but Youtube has videos, and its very easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and good size
customer_reviews.text: We like the size of this to use next to our card table to hold drinks and snacks. It is a good size for two people to share one table and still have room to get in and out of your seat. I like the height adjustable nature of this table too. It's awkward to open and close it but maybe the mechanism just needs more use and it will get smoother and easier. Good solid product for the money. It's more expensive than most but I think the quality is there and it comes with a LIFETIME warranty!!!!
customer_reviews.author: goodtaste

customer_reviews.title: I wish they had published this....
customer_reviews.text: If I had known this table was rated for only 40 pounds I would not have purchased it. I will not risk a 30 pound sewing machine on the adjustable leg system.
customer_reviews.author: J Lochaby

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table; hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: Feels very sturdy and stable. Nice little 1-2 person patio table or laptop table. I use it to sit outside with a large tablet or to eat dinner outside. Deducted one star because the folding/sizing mechanism is kind of hard to use, so I don't recommend this to people who care a lot about being able to routinely fold it/take it places. You have to squeeze the bar into and out of the top part to make it work. For me this isn't a big deal, I just wanted a little patio table.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for distance learning at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these - one for each of my kids - as portable desks while they do distance learning from home. They are good sized and can easily accommodate a laptop, paper, etc. I like that the height is adjustable, so they can adjust based on where they are sitting (couch, dining chair, etc.). They fold flat and can be stored away easily and they wipe up nice. Great value for the price. We will likely use them for TV dining or craft projects once distance learning is done.
customer_reviews.author: Mililani Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love This Table!!  Another Amazing Lifetime Product
customer_reviews.text: This table rocks. We use it in our living room when we binge-watch and want to eat in front of the TV. I used to have a different brand of TV table, but got so fed up with my milk spilling all over the carpet anytime I bumped it. This table, however, bumps you. It is tough. And it won't just collapse for no good reason like a precarious ironing board. This is one of many products we've used made by Lifetime (tables, chairs, shed), and all of them have been great -- And I don't get a penny for saying that. It's just the facts.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Hales

customer_reviews.title: Handy Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly sturdy table. I bought this for my mom who is in a wheelchair. The height is adjustable (3-4 choices of height) so it worked well for that and she is able to pull it up close to her because of how the legs are made. It is not sturdy enough for someone to lean their weight on. It does hold a tray of food with heavy dishes and does not really shake or wobble.
customer_reviews.author: SuusTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, I almost didnt but it from some of the reviews. There are no instructions, that come with the table but you dont need it because its so easy to put together. I have it on carpet, so its not that sturdy. With that said I dont know how sturdy it will be when placed on a flat surface. I am so very happy with this table, easy to set up and so very easy to take down. Folds very nicely and fits in compact places. So glad that I purcahsed this....
customer_reviews.author: R. Pell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small projects sested from your favorite chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my guns from my recliner chair. Previously, having to sit at the kitchen table was a pain. The height was wrong plus I didn't like getting chemicals on my furniture. This is perfect. I can adjust the height easily, plenty of room to clean pistols with a gun mat, cleaners, bore snakes, and room left over for all your pistol parts after you've field stripped your gun. It folds flat in seconds and stores in a closet, and cleaning is a simple wipe down with Windex or Lysol wipes. It makes cleaning guns far more comfortable and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Lunar Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FOLDING TABLE-HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I am working from home due to the current health crisis. I needed a sturdy table to hold my laptop, files, etc. but able to be folded and put away when I don't need it. This has three adjustable heights. It is perfect for my current situation and is very sturdy and made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Covell

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to carry for me, folds easily, height adjustment is super convenient, not too large and not too small. I paid $26 at the time for this table and I really love it. The higher you adjust it it can be ever so slightly wobbly, but it's honestly so minimal (and expected due to the weight imbalance as you adjust it higher) that it doesn't lessen the quality in my opinion. Laptop is about 12.5inx9in for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to use for art projects and crafting. I do a variety of art related projects including jewelry, so tools and elements galore. The table is a good size, sturdy and easy to set up and take down. My issue with it is that the edge of the table has a weird angle that creates a problem with things rolling off and over that edge. I finally put a length of textured shelf liner to help alleviate the rolling problem.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna M. Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: These little tables are incredibly sturdy. I bought it for working on crafts in the living room. I am extremely pleased with it, so much that I ended up buying another for my husband. It is the perfect size, giving an adequate amount of working space. I would purchase again in a heartbeat. They are easy to fold, once you get the hang of how they work. Can't really put your legs under them, due to the crossed legs, but your legs fit around the metal legs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi L.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk alternative for laptops and projects
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a couch desk for when I work from home and do not want to be stuck at my standard desk. This works perfect! The size is great for my laptop, but would also work great for small projects. I find myself using it constantly for any work and personal cycles. It’s a sturdy table and folds up nicely so it can be stashed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Ogden

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I had to knock off two stars because of a dark smudge and a mysterious tear that the table had brand-new out of the box, but this is one of the best purchases I have ever, EVER made. I love this table. I usually buy the wooden TV trays, but those are not sturdy enough and end up breaking on me before a year is up. This feels virtually indestructible. Also, the tabletop is much larger than the wooden ones which is a plus since I drive an 18-wheeler and rest my air fryer on top of it. All in all, I hope to have this wonderful table for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Sturdy and Easily Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my laptop computer and it is perfect. It is sturdy, easily adjustable, and just the right area for my oversized laptop with the big old relic of a mouse that I use. The only problem that I have encountered is that the outside 1 inch around entire top surface is slanted and very slick. The rest if the top is textured to keep things from sliding around. It took me a few days to get used to the slanted edge and had several things fall off the edge.
customer_reviews.author: M. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband so he can work in the evening in our living room. He'd been using a smaller tv tray, but needed more room. This fits the bill. This goes higher than the tv tray which makes it easier to work on. It also offers more work surface and leg room underneath. It's quite sturdy. Assembly and take down is an easy process. I'm completely satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's quick and easy to set up. I use it for working from home. I used a TV tray table but it was too small. This is a nice size. I've used it to cut veggies. I can't stand a long time and this is the right height. I also used it to repot some new plants on my porch. It cleaned very easily. It's light weight, but very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LisaFayD

customer_reviews.title: Unique small table perfect for my need
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an adjustable small table I could use to hold my flatbed scanner when I'm working on a project. I wanted something that was sturdy and wouldn't be easily knocked over. The size is perfect for my need and the legs are very sturdy. It was interesting how the heavy plastic top is molded in such a way as to hold the legs tight to the unit when it's folded up (ie: no floppy legs). It's a great quality small folding utility table.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy little table
customer_reviews.text: While I am happy with how sturdy and easy to clean this little table is, and I feel a fair price for what you get, it is hard to figure out how to open and secure it. I hurt my wrist and broke a fingernail doing it the first time. And while the legs are set up in a way that you can raise and lower the table, the configuration doesn't make it ideal for sitting at it. I would still recommend it and I will use it a lot. The pros outweigh the cons by quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: DBG

customer_reviews.title: Used the 30" table to complete an "L" shaped buffet set-up.
customer_reviews.text: Used the 30" table to complete an "L" shaped buffet set-up. I was pleased with the results. The only negative is that I later found the same table locally for $10 cheaper but try finding that when you need it!
customer_reviews.author: JWest

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This table is very well made and sturdy. I use it for additional desk space in a small office. My only complaint is that it didn’t come with better directions for initially opening the tray. It’s very difficult to do and you have to be careful not to break the trigger mechanism when first opening the tray. For my purposes I keep it open but it’s easy enough to fold if needed. I love that it’s so sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: spagirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great for online schooling and gaming set up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to set up a space to do online school. At night it’s used for his gaming set up. Sometimes used to eat in front of tv. Uses are endless. Takes time to get used to how to adjust height and collapsed. Love that I can tuck it away under futon. Sturdy. Mobile. Multi purpose uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kat T.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. Are use it when I make my Nautical knots (hobby). The height is adjustable and when placed on a hard surface it does not wobble, it’s a little unsteady on thick carpet, that might be due to the fact that it is very light weight and it’s not heavy. It folds down and clips in securely and I’m able to store it. It’s Easy to clean surface. Would recommend it for hobby work, or a deluxe TV dinner stand.
customer_reviews.author: The Gigler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tiny Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little table. There is a latch of sorts underneath to squeeze and adjust the height so that you can change it without unscrewing. This makes it easy to quickly change the height of the table. It’s a great size for small purposes. I’m using this in my home office when I do friends’ nails. I didn’t want a table too deep. I have found numerous other uses for it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Compared to the old wood tv trays...not bad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold....technically yes, but im far too lazy for what yhis requires. Not like a wood tray where u move the bar across and its done. I have to flip it over, lay it on the couch, then lock it in place. Not a fault of the table, just me. Quality is very good and it does its job. Little larger to store than wooden ones. Overall a good buy. It will last longer than the wood ones, so worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Freezin' in Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile and durable tray
customer_reviews.text: We love these. I had previously purchased 5 of these. I recently have had to help my mom and she couldn't sit at the kitchen table due to some surgery. I bought 2 of these and will be buying 2 more for her house. How sturdy you ask? I purchased my 5 tables about 4 years ago and have had no issues. They are just as great today as when I purchased them. Doesn't matter if a child or adult uses the tray as it easily adjusts to just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the small wooden TV trays
customer_reviews.text: It does the job! Only real pet peeve is the surface is very slippery even with the textures finish. Anything hard plastic like remotes, controllers, etc. will slide around if you barely bump it, and if you need to move the table it's probably best if you don't have a drink or anything fragile sitting on it. Still 5 stars because I love the size and simplicity... And it's not the fault of the manufacturer for plastic being slippery, it's just how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Travis G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and take down, steady once set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely designed folding table. The height is easy to adjust. The surface area is a great size. Lots of work space, but it doesn't take up a lot of space in a room. I had to figure out the setup--the directions could be a little clearer--but once I figured it out, it's no problem. And I imagine others might have no problem at all following the directions. I can be thick about theses things. All in all, good value, works great! I will probably order a couple more for other rooms in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Honest American Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love the table and had one for years
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second for my smaller puzzles and side table when I need. So much more sturdy than those sets of four wooden tables that really give you no room. Now when I want a decent TV table for a dinner theater at home I have room, extra sturdy table and washable, so the shellac on the wood won't wear away anymore cause those wooden tables have been replaced with a hygienically cleaner table. It will last longer too!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: STURDY! PERFECT SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! I had one previously just like it but my son used it to set his table top grill on it and burned a hole thru it. I was very upset with him as I'd had it for years. Now I have a replacement just like it and I'm happy. very portable, light weight, and enough room for laptop and mouse use and I can do homework at it with my tabletop book holder. Great investment. I'm sure I'll get a lot more years out of this one than I did the previous one. My son will NOT be using this one! lol
customer_reviews.author: Catiera Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of box and set up in less than 5 minutes. This table is perfect!!! I will buy more. This one is for me to set next to my chair. I crochet so it's perfect for my projects. It is super sturdy so I will get one to use as a utility table. I already have ideas for several more. This table gets 10 stars for everything. If you are wondering if you should buy one stop wondering and do it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dicken

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this little table!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little table as a temporary desk while I work from home. It is a great size and folds up nicely. It was definitely worth the shipping cost as it was not eligible for prime at the time of my purchase. I can comfortably fit a laptop and mouse on the surface and the top will not bow as I had seen in reviews for other similar tables. The mechanism for setting the legs in place could be improved, as it currently has a plastic squeeze lever to retract the bar and set it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: A great sturdy, durable little table. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Perfect size for diamond painting in my favorite chair, journaling, and drawing. I did have a challenge in first setting it up because I did not want to break it especially the lever, but I was able to figure it out and not break the plastic thinga m jig.. Btw- once you unsnap the legs ya squeeze the bar together that has the thingy m jig to chose the height of the table... lol I plan on buying another one soon. Great little/sturdy table and not terribly heavy to move. Love love love this table.
customer_reviews.author: Love It!

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog bathing!
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in my tub so I can bathe my dog without killing my back from bending over. I had a larger table that was workable, but heavy and didn't quite fit the tub. So I was looking for something smaller and lighter that won't be ruined by occasional wetting. (Then sold the old table for more than I paid for this one!) Four stars only because it's a little hard to fold and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: sjt

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that the ends are rounded; something may slip off even it it's  less than 26 inches wide.
customer_reviews.text: It seems quite sturdy, and the video helped with setting it up. Had to convert the height measurements from cm to inches to figure out what I wanted. The main drawback for me is that I'd planned on setting some stacking trays that are 24 inches wide on this table, with an inch to spare at each end. The ends of the tray table are so rounded that the main sides are only 20 inches wide -- so my stacking trays will slide off. I can still use the table, but not for the original purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Jo Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for remote learning.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for my 1st and 5th graders. Easy to fold and put up without the help of mom and dad. So glad we got these. Space for their chromebooks, notebooks and supplies. Making remote learning so much better!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I bought the 26 Inch, White Granite version
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I bought this to do nails on but I have used it for a whole bunch of things already. It is lightweight, folds flat, sturdy, Big enough to spread all my stuff out on but small enough to be very portable and fit in my crowded apt. The legg folding is definitely a 2 handed job but it isn't difficult. If it were cheaper I would buy like 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Mogollon

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: While visiting friends in Florida and helping set up for an outside party, they pulled out this table. Since I had a party coming up soon and needed a small table to put next to my bar for extra room, I thought it was perfect. The height is adjustable and I used it at the highest notch. The only reason I couldn't give it 5 stars was because I had some difficulty squeezing together the piece underneath that allows you to adjust the height. It also folds flat when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Grace R.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these tables over the past 5 years. I love the adjustability of these tables. The choice in heights allows for different uses and accommodates persons of various sizes. My table stays in use all day. The other two tables were given as gifts after friends threatened to leave with mine. My table is still like new after 5 years of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom English

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, sturdy tables with many sizes to choose from
customer_reviews.text: Terrific tables with many sizes to choose from. They are more like small tables than TV trays and we use them in our RV. The size we chose take a good deal of space but are the size for our needs. They handle a large meal, computers, art projects and the like. They take very little storage space. They are sturdy and not easily tipped or tripped over. You really have to see them to appreciate them Great little tables and we highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: California Royer

customer_reviews.title: Need muscle strength
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time getting it apart! If you don't have a lot of hand and arm muscle strength do not buy this table.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and to help you out, it doesn't come with instructions. You have to squeeze a plastic leaver under it on the legs to make the bar shorter so that it fit into the grooves to allow it to stand up. Wasn't easy to figure this out. But regardless, the table top is thick and sturdy and made well it appears. The legs are metal and I stand mine on carpet and no problems with stability. I just hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Like: Adjustable heights, clean lines, nice surface (white with flecks of color), sturdy Dislike: Maybe more color choices With health crisis and working from home, I needed a table for my laptop and notes for long hours of work. It is perfect for work and as a snack sewing table— whatever. At 30 inches it is a perfect fit for my needs! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandmother as her previous 'tv dinner table' broke, and I must say I was surprised at the sturdiness and great quality of the table. My grandmother loves it, she can eat and watch her shows comfortably in the living room, the table is wide enough for her to put her food, drinks, tablet and phone down without it seeming too cluttered. It's easy to put away. Not bulky. Extremely study.
customer_reviews.author: Amorgitano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of one of these handy tables. First one was bought 6 yeats ago, still using it on my porch!! Bought this one to use in the house, when we need another table for a computer or sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, sturdy and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: It is convenient to have being that I am currently working from home. The table is sturdy (even on carpet) and provides a decent amount of leg room. I keep it near my couch to hold up my work desktop. It has enough room for the tower, monitor, keyboard, mouse, notepad and a few smaller items. It is also reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Great side Table, great price
customer_reviews.text: I spotted this table at my local game store, and when I found it here I was very pleased. The table is absolutely fantastic, It always seems to be the right size for the job, the legs are offset to one side for ease of access and it folds very flat. The locking mechanism can be a little funky, other than that I would recommend it enthusiastically.Nice size, sturdy and folds up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Skotakollr

customer_reviews.title: Temporary work-from-home table!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for my temporary working-from-home situation! I need room for a laptop and taking notes. Plenty of room for it! I could even setup an extra monitor on the table if need be. On the weekends I can fold it up and put it away. After this Covid-19 is over I can use the table for other projects. Super sturdy! Takes up minimal space! Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I apologize!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote that the table did not open easily and that it was almost impossible to open; I was wrong! I managed to figure it and now I can open it every day without any problem; I put a red arrow to show me where to press down and now I got it right each time; it is a good and solid table but it would help to have a SIMPLE explanation on how to open and close it. Even the video is not quite clear.
customer_reviews.author: Claudine

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one when my old tray (different one) cracked and broke. This one is very sturdy and plenty of leg room. I can even bring it right up to my body if I want with no issue. The only thing I don't like is that it is difficult to fold and unfold so I leave it up at all times. I can't store it behind my couch when I'm done with it. Well... I CAN... I just don't cause it isn't easy. Other than that it's great! I wouldn't go back to my old one if you paid me
customer_reviews.author: Brad Tharp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality table
customer_reviews.text: Table top is made of plastic & the legs are metal - its durable. I bought this to replace a wood TV tray that I was using to keep my P.C. on, which had wood finish that was starting to come off which could be dangerous. I like that its a plastic table top as its not going to shed particles or get damaged as easily as wood. I will probably buy more of these in future to replace other wood tables I have.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy on budget, and perfect for space...
customer_reviews.text: Renting out a room and really needed a table where I could use my laptop, work on school and draw. Got the 30-incher. This is perfect for the size of my room, as it doesn't take up too much space. The way I have it set up, is I have it at the foot of my bed, next to the fridge. Using my bed as the chair, it's my ideal workspace. Still doesn't feel cramped. The table itself is lightweight, so I can move it around no hassle. Pretty much nonexistent setup. I can imagine bringing this along with me on any future travels, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mowalski

customer_reviews.title: The table that can be used for a myriad of things
customer_reviews.text: I love these lifetime tables. We bought 4 a few years ago and these are even better than those because they are larger. I work from home and I prefer the lifetime table to set my large Apple laptop, have room for a plate of food and a drink and of course my paperwork. I would recommend this to anyone to use it for a multitude of reasons. When I am finished with my work I fold up the table and it goes in the closet. I had a large deskin my room and decided I wanted room for other decorative items so the lifetime table was a perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: sherian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working on the couch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking into getting a laptop tray or something until a friend sent me this one after she bought it. Smaller size is perfect to work with my mac, a cup of coffee, and my phone all on the table. When it arrived, I did have some issues with unlocking the leg, I ended up having to improvise how to push the small black button to unfold the table completely.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna S

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my students to use in my classroom and they’re perfect! The shipping was fast and they work great. They are a little difficult for my students to fold up, but once we all get the hang of it, they will work great. My ONLY complaint is that I wish there was a latch to hold the legs when they are folded because I need to store them standing up.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE This thing. It's the simple things in life that make me happy and this table is as simple, yet as effective as it gets! Had one of those bamboo wood looking TV tray tables that I kept by my recliner and it got warped and wobbly really fast. I have previous experience with a larger Lifetime folding table that I use for picnics and in the workshop and it's been going strong for years. I am expecting this one to last just as long. Very sturdy and it was a nice surprise to know it is adjustable height.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking this little table. It's the height of a TV tray, so not regular table height. But it has been a handy thing to cart around because it's so light weight. I bought it primarily to take on a retreat and it was perfect for what I needed there. But I've also used it with my laptop and grandkids and several other times. Easy to clean, but it's the same material as the white plastic banquet tables, so it does have the potential to stain.
customer_reviews.author: LFarrand

customer_reviews.title: Great extra work space
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about having leg room, this table was designed to give a person plenty of leg room. I like that the height is adjustable.adjusting the height is a little difficult you need to pull on a lever and slide the legs. Locking the legs is a little hard they get pushed into the molding. Overall I really like the sturdiness of the table and the smooth surface is great for writing on.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Once you figure out the leg mechanism, it is a great little table.
customer_reviews.text: This is my work table for hobbies. I put a heavy stone slab on it for leathercrafting. I put big 3 and 5 gallon glass carboys for making wine. It is a great size and very sturdy. It also folds up very flat for storage. The leg mechanism is awkward and difficult to figure out at first, but works fine once you get the hang of it. It is a great little table.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Laurie Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Not if you have any HINT of weakness in your hand
customer_reviews.text: I don't do weight training exercises with my fingers. But it takes a good amount of strength, IMHO, to set this up. I found myself struggling to squeeze the lever hard enough to just set this up. I doubt I take it down anytime soon as a result. Very sturdy, I love the width of the table and the height is adjustable. Just be prepared to have to do arm curls and finger squeezes for a few weeks before you adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra
